00058 template<class TESTEDCLASS> 
00059 class CurlAccountConfirmMailTest : public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture 
00060 {
00061 
00063   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE( CurlAccountConfirmMailTest );
00064 
00066   CPPUNIT_TEST( testDefaultName );
00068   CPPUNIT_TEST( testSettedName );
00069 
00070 
00072   CPPUNIT_TEST( testAddAccount );
00074   CPPUNIT_TEST( testMailNotConfirmed );
00076   CPPUNIT_TEST( testMailIsConfirmed );
00078   CPPUNIT_TEST( testDeleteAccount );
00079 
00080 
00082   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00083 
00084 protected:
00088   TESTEDCLASS   *m_testedClass;
00089   
00090 public:
00096   int countTestCases(){
00097     return 1;
00098   }
00099 
00103   void setUp(){ 
00104     this->m_testedClass = new TESTEDCLASS; 
00105   }
00106   
00110   void tearDown(){ 
00111     delete this->m_testedClass; 
00112   }
00113 
00121   void testAddAccount(){
00122     CurlAccountAdd caa;
00123 
00124     caa.setName(CLIENT_NAME);
00125     caa.setPassword(CLIENT_PWD);
00126     caa.setMail(CLIENT_MAIL);
00127     bool bret=caa.perform();
00128     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( bret==true);
00129 
00130     tCurlAccountAddReturn ret=caa.getResponse();
00131     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==CAA_SUCCESS);
00132 
00133   }
00134 
00140   void testDeleteAccount(){
00141     CurlAccountDelete cad;
00142     cad.setName(CLIENT_NAME);
00143     bool bret=cad.perform();
00144     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( bret==true);
00145   }
00146 
00150   void testMailNotConfirmed(){
00151     ClientConnect cc(CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_PWD);
00152     tClientConnectReturn ret=cc.getResponse();
00153 
00154     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==CCR_EMAIL_NOT_VALIDATED);
00155   }
00156 
00162   void coutClientConnectReturn(tClientConnectReturn ccr){
00163     const char* ret;
00164 
00165     switch(ccr){
00166     case CCR_SUCCESS:
00167       ret="CCR_SUCCESS";
00168       break;
00169     case CCR_INEXISTANT_USER:
00170       ret="CCR_INEXISTANT_USER";
00171       break;
00172     case CCR_WRONG_PWD:
00173       ret="CCR_WRONG_PWD";
00174       break;
00175     case CCR_EMAIL_NOT_VALIDATED:
00176       ret="CCR_EMAIL_NOT_VALIDATED";
00177       break;
00178     case CCR_BLACKLIST:
00179       ret="CCR_BLACKLIST";
00180       break;
00181     case CCR_UNKNOWN_ERROR:
00182       ret="CCR_UNKNOWN_ERROR";
00183       break;
00184 
00185     }
00186 
00187     cout << ret;
00188 
00189   }
00190 
00194   void testDefaultName(){
00195     const char* name=this->m_testedClass->getName();
00196     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( strcmp(name, "")==0);
00197 
00198   }
00199 
00203   void testSettedName(){
00204     const char* n="Name";
00205     this->m_testedClass->setName(n);
00206     const char* name=this->m_testedClass->getName();
00207     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( strcmp(name, n)==0);
00208 
00209   }
00210 
00214   void testMailIsConfirmed(){
00215     this->m_testedClass->setName(CLIENT_NAME);
00216     bool bret=this->m_testedClass->perform();
00217     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( bret==true);
00218 
00219 
00220     ClientConnect cc(CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_PWD);
00221     tClientConnectReturn ret=cc.getResponse();
00222     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==CCR_SUCCESS);
00223   }
00224 
00225 };
